uvi.description:
misc/libmasm/module: Fix two use after free in ibmasm_init_one

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.13.4 by commit a7268e8a227d5a4f0bd1584f556246b0224ab274. For more details please see the references link.
